source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (timesheets) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment)
- **New Data:** where a segment_id in the source does not exist as an SegmentID in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on segment_id in source and SegmentID in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an SegmentID in the target exists but the same information doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View timesheets_work_segment_new is created

%%sql
-- Build religion_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_work_segment_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.segment_id IS NULL
        THEN T5.SegmentID
    END                             AS TimesheetsWorkSegmentID, -- surrogate key
    T1.segment_id                   AS SegmentID,
    T4.EmployeeID                   AS EmployeeID,
    T1.segment_date                 AS SegmentDate,
    T1.start_time                   AS StartTime,
    T1.end_time                     AS EndTime,
    T1.case_reference               AS CaseReference,
    T1.segment_type                 AS SegmentType,
    T1.worked_minutes               AS WorkedMinutes,
    T1.created_at                   AS CreatedAt,
    T1.updated_at                   AS UpdatedAt,
    T1.case_display_name            AS CaseDisplayName,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat( 
            IFNULL(T1.segment_id,'.'),
            IFNULL(T4.EmployeeID,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.segment_date,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.start_time,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.end_time,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.segment_type,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.worked_minutes,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.created_at,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.updated_at,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_display_name,'.')
            )
        )                           AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive, 
    T5.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.timesheets_work_segment T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Timesheets" = T2.Description 
        AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.timesheets_employee T3 
    ON T1.employee_id = T3.employee_id
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T4 
    ON T3.staff_number = T4.EmployeeNumber 
        AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim T5 
    ON T1.segment_id = T5.SegmentID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.segment_id = T5.SegmentID 
                AND md5(
                    concat(
                        IFNULL(T1.segment_id,'.'),
                        IFNULL(T4.EmployeeID,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.segment_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.start_time,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.end_time,'.'),
                        IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.segment_type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.worked_minutes,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_at,'.'),
                        IFNULL(T1.updated_at,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.case_display_name,'.')
                        )
                    )  <> T5.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T5.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) 
    AND T1.segment_id IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.timesheets_work_segment);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **table_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View table_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_work_segment_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From timesheets_work_segment_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim
WHERE SegmentID IN (SELECT SegmentID FROM timesheets_work_segment_new WHERE EmployeeID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';
## Cell to calculate ValidTo date for changed registers

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM timesheets_work_segment_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_work_segment_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM timesheets_work_segment_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View religion_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key, ValidTo is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.XXX_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim AS Target
USING timesheets_work_segment_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID = Target.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID

-- updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'
        
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
        SegmentID,
        EmployeeID,
        SegmentDate,
        StartTime,
        EndTime,
        CaseReference,
        SegmentType,
        WorkedMinutes,
        CreatedAt,
        UpdatedAt,
        CaseDisplayName,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
        Source.SegmentID,
        Source.EmployeeID,
        Source.SegmentDate,
        Source.StartTime,
        Source.EndTime,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.SegmentType,
        Source.WorkedMinutes,
        Source.CreatedAt,
        Source.UpdatedAt,
        Source.CaseDisplayName,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) 
;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.religion_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new ID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TimesheetsWorkSegmentID NULLS LAST) AS TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim;
